にょきりにょきり: (にょきりにょきり) - feelings; memories; imagined items or dreams that sprout up one after the other
にょっきり: (にょっきり) - sticking out prominently (usu. something long and thin); rising up
にょろにょろ: (にょろにょろ) - slitheringly; wriggling, slipping and sliding
によって異なる: (によってことなる) - to differ depending on ...
にらいかない: (にらいかない) - paradise across the ocean (folk belief of Okinawa & Amami)
にらみ付ける: (にらみつける) - to glare at; to scowl at
にらみ合い: (にらみあい) - glaring at each other; confrontation/standoff/face-off
にんまり笑う: (にんまりわらう) - to smile complacently; to smile a smile of satisfaction
にん傷に及ぶ: (にんじょうにおよぶ) - to come to bloodshed
に亘って: (にわたって) - throughout; over a period of ...; over a span of ...
に亘り: (にわたり) - throughout; over a period of ...; over a span of ...
に付いて: (について) - concerning/regarding; per (e.g. 100 yen per person)/for every
に付き: (につき) - because of/on account of; regarding; per/apiece
に伴い: (にともない) - as; because; with; due to
に依って: (によって) - according to; by (means of); due to; because of
に依り: (により) - according to; by (means of); due to; because of
に依る: (による) - by means of; due to; because of; according to
に備えて: (にそなえて) - in preparation (for); in case (of); in the lead-up (to)
に劣らず: (におとらず) - just like; the same as; no different than
に取って: (にとって) - to; for; concerning; as far as ... is concerned; regarding
に取りまして: (にとりまして) - to; for; concerning; as far as ... is concerned; regarding
に向けて: (にむけて) - towards (a destination); for the purpose of; with the goal of; targeting (a group, a demographic)
に因って: (によって) - according to; by (means of); due to; because of
に因り: (により) - according to; by (means of); due to; because of
に因る: (による) - by means of; due to; because of; according to
に因んで: (にちなんで) - named after; associated with; connected with
に基づいて: (にもとづいて) - based on; on the basis of
に対し: (にたいし) - towards; against; regarding; in contrast with
に対して: (にたいして) - towards; against; regarding; in contrast with
に対する: (にたいする) - regarding; in; to; towards; with regards to
に就いて: (について) - concerning/regarding; per (e.g. 100 yen per person)/for every
に就き: (につき) - because of/on account of; regarding; per/apiece
に就て: (について) - concerning/regarding; per (e.g. 100 yen per person)/for every
に当たって: (にあたって) - at the time of (ind. opportunity or situation where something should be done)
に影響されて: (にえいきょうされて) - influenced by; in response to; in the wake of; triggered by; following
に従い: (にしたがい) - in accordance with; according to
に従って: (にしたがって) - in accordance with; according to; as X, then Y (e.g. as we age we gain wisdom, as wine matures it becomes more valuable, etc.)
に応じて: (におうじて) - depending on; dependent on
に拠る: (による) - by means of; due to; because of; according to
に於いて: (において) - in; on; at (place); as for; regarding
に於ける: (における) - in; at; on; as for; regarding; with regards to
に沿って: (にそって) - along; parallel to; in accordance with
に渡って: (にわたって) - throughout; over a period of ...; over a span of ...
に渡り: (にわたり) - throughout; over a period of ...; over a span of ...
に照らして: (にてらして) - in comparison with; when compared with; according to; in light of; in view of
に照らすと: (にてらすと) - in comparison with; when compared with; according to; in light of; in view of
に置いて: (において) - in; on; at (place); as for; regarding
に超したことはない: (にこしたことはない) - it is better to; it is best to; there's nothing better than
に越したことはない: (にこしたことはない) - it is better to; it is best to; there's nothing better than
に連れ: (につれ) - as X, then Y (e.g. as we age we gain wisdom, as wine matures it becomes more valuable, etc.)
に連れて: (につれて) - as X, then Y (e.g. as we age we gain wisdom, as wine matures it becomes more valuable, etc.)
に過ぎない: (にすぎない) - no more than; just; only; mere; goes no further than
に違いない: (にちがいない) - I am sure; no doubt that; must; must have (done)
に関し: (にかんし) - related to; in relation to
に関して: (にかんして) - related to; in relation to
に関する: (にかんする) - related to; in relation to
に関する限り: (にかんするかぎり) - as far as ... is concerned; so far as ... can tell
に限って: (にかぎって) - (particularly) when ... (often in phrases like "the bus just has to be on-time when we are late"); (only) for ...; if we are restricting the discussion to...; in the particular case of
に限らず: (にかぎらず) - not limited to; not just ...
に際して: (にさいして) - on the occasion of; at the time of
ぬ: (ぬ) - (after the -nai stem of a verb) not (verb-negating suffix); indicates completion
ぬかに釘: (ぬかにくぎ) - having no effect; waste of effort
ぬか喜び: (ぬかよろこび) - premature joy; short-lived elation
ぬか床: (ぬかどこ) - bed of salted rice bran used for pickling
ぬき出す: (ぬきだす) - to pick out/to single out/to select; to extract/to draw out/to pull out/to distill
ぬぐい去る: (ぬぐいさる) - to rub out; to clean off; to clear away; to efface; to erase
ぬぐい取る: (ぬぐいとる) - to wipe off; to wipe out; to expunge
ぬすみ食い: (ぬすみぐい) - sneaking a bite; snitching food
ぬたうつ: (ぬたうつ) - to roll around in the grass or mud
ぬたくる: (ぬたくる) - to scrawl; to daub
ぬっぺらぼう: (ぬっぺらぼう) - smooth/flat/lacking bumps and dents; featureless/uneventful; mythical being with flat featureless face
ぬめっと: (ぬめっと) - glistening; shiny; sleek; slippery
ぬめ革: (ぬめかわ) - cow hide tanned using tannin
ぬらりくらり: (ぬらりくらり) - lazy; evasive; non-commital; slippery as an eel
ぬりこ星: (ぬりこぼし) - Chinese "Willow" constellation (one of the 28 mansions)
ぬるま湯: (nurumayu) - água morna; confortável, fácil, relaxado, complacente, mimado, sem estímulo, monótono, sem acontecimentos
ぬるま湯につかる: (ぬるまゆにつかる) - to be comfortable; to be easy; to be relaxed; to be cosseted
